titles.title: Honoring the life and achievements of Lucretia Mott and the 140th anniversary of her death.
Honoring the life and achievements of Lucretia Mott and the 140th anniversary of her death.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: This resolution honors the the life of Lucretia Mott and her achievements as a suffragette and abolitionist and expresses appreciation for her service to her country.
